adv: The interface as well as the plots are really intuitive and easy-to-understand. The visualization are very appealing and the ability to hover over the graph and see the exact values helped a lot.
disadv: The maximum number of attributes/column-headers that could be visualized using the tool were 3, would be interesting to see if we can plot more attributes. Maybe 3D visualizations?
comment: Really cool interface and demo! Thank you.
